Package kesako.utilities

Description Utilities package for Kes@Ko software.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constant
    Constants of Kes@Ko
    DBUtilities
    Data-base utilities.
    FileUtilities
    File utilities.
    ImageUtilities
    Utilitie's class to return all images needed by Kes@Ko.
    LoadJarFile
    Useful class for dynamically loading jar file during runtime.
    OSValidator
    Class that allow to identify the OS
    Parameters
    This class initializes all parameters needed by the application Kes@Ko.
    SOLRUtilities
    SOLR utilities for Kes@Ko.
    XMLUtilities
    XML utilities.

Package kesako.utilities Description

Description

Utilities package for Kes@Ko software.
